price: (30) They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuki innahu huwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
